scripts.build: npm run prepare:fe && npm run build -w apps/backend
scripts.start: npm run prepare:fe && npm run start -w apps/backend
scripts.start:dev: concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c blue,magenta "npm run start:dev -w apps/backend" "npm run start -w apps/frontend"
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w apps/backend && rm -rf node_modules
